items.title: Dow soars by 1,200 points to top 50,000 for the first time as chipmakers and airlines lead ferocious stock market rebound
items.description: Even with Friday’s surge, the S&P 500 still fell to its third losing week in the last four.

items.title: Anthropic’s newest model excels at finding security vulnerabilities—but raises fresh cybersecurity risks
items.description: Claude Opus 4.6 identified over 500 previously unknown 'zero day' vulnerabilities, according to Anthropic security experts

items.title: USAID division killed by Trump is reborn after 2 mysterious donors give $48 million

items.title: Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos argues its Warner Bros. deal won’t hurt consumers. If so, they can cancel with one click
items.description: Sarandos defended Netflix’s Warner Bros. merger and argued customers hold the real power.
